title: After Naval Drills With Iran, South Africa Faces New U.S. Attacks
summary_full: The exercises were the second time in six months that President Cyril Ramaphosa appeared to be blindsided by his own military regarding relations with Tehran.
summary_public: The exercises were the second time in six months that President Cyril Ramaphosa appeared to be blindsided by his own military regarding relations with Tehran.
